title: Jazz - Bill Evans 1956-62 on Riverside
description:
Jazz - Bill Evans 1956-62 on Riverside

01 1956 New Jazz Conceptions
02 1958 Peace Piece
03 1959 Portrait In Jazz - Evans, LaFaro, Motian
04 1961 Explorations - Evans, LaFaro, Motian
05 1961 Sunday At Village Vanguard & Waltz For Debbie, last with LaFaro
07 1962 How My Heart Sings & Time Remembered Like Moonbeams
08 1962 Moonbeams new Bassist, Israels
09 1962 Interplay w Freddie Hubbard, JimHall, PercyHeath

This is the "The Complete Riverside Recordings" box set which I've more-or-less arranged into the LP issues. Purists can reconstruct the box-set ordering, or the LP orderings, by going to Bill Evans discographies at AMG.

For the most serious and complete data on these and other Evans recordings 
check out <a href="
http://www.jazzdisco.org/bill-evans/discography/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.jazzdisco.org/bill-evans/discography/</a>
